projects.name: Twitter Clone
projects.description: This is a clone of twitter app. It has some basic functionalities such as the Add new tweet, like tweet, load tweet(s) etc. It was built during my Udacity React Nanodegree.

projects.name: Would You Rather?
projects.description: It is a web app that lets a user play the “Would You Rather?” game. The game goes like this: A user is asked a question in the form: “Would you rather [option A] or [option B] ?”. Answering 'neither' or 'both' is against the rules.

projects.name: Edugate(still in progress)
projects.description: This project is titled Edugate. The idea behind this project centers around providing result management system to schools expecially high school around the globe.

projects.name: Vertical Search Engine
projects.description: A vertical search engine for students who want to apply for postgraduate research studies and look for potential supervisors at a UK university(Imperial, lancaster and coventry university)
